title.rendered: West Indies Women vs England Women, 2nd ODI: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for West Indies: Hayley Matthews (c), Aaliyah Alleyne, Kycia Knight (wk), Rashada Williams, Shemaine Campbelle, Chedean Nation, Chinelle Henry, Afy Fletcher, Cherry Ann Fraser, Sheneta Grimmond, Shakera Selman

Probable XI for England: Tammy Beaumont, Alice Capsey, Sophia Dunkley, Natalie Sciver, Heather Knight (c), Danielle Wyatt, Amy Jones (wk), Sophie Ecclestone, Charlotte Dean, Kate Cross, Lauren Bell

Pitch Report

Venue: Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 215

2nd innings average score: 168

Wickets per innings: 8

Type: Slow and sluggish.

Weather: Clear.

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Consistency, coupled with reputation makes England’s batting more formidable than the West Indies.

Natalie Sciver loves playing against the West Indies. Besides adding 159 runs, including 90 in the previous game, she has taken 5 wickets in the last 5 ODIs against them.

Charlotte Dean has regularly provided England with breakthroughs. She has already bagged 26 wickets for the year, including three four-wicket hauls in 15 ODIs.

1 / 5 ( 2 votes )
